name: GetBlogTags
description:
Retrieve a list of blog tags with paging and filtering options.

This tool fetches the list of blog tags, supporting paging and filtering. It is useful for integrations that need to access blog tags for analysis or editing suggestions.

parameters.name: filter_by_creation_time
parameters.description: Filter blog tags to return only those created at the specified exact time. Use ISO 8601 format for the date-time.

value_schema.description: Only return Blog Tags created at exactly the specified time.

parameters.name: created_after_time
parameters.description: Only return Blog Tags created after the specified time. Provide the time in ISO 8601 format.

value_schema.description: Only return Blog Tags created after the specified time.

parameters.name: filter_tags_created_before
parameters.description: Only return blog tags created before the specified date and time in UTC, formatted as an ISO 8601 string.

value_schema.description: Only return Blog Tags created before the specified time.

parameters.name: updated_at_exact
parameters.description: Return blog tags last updated at the specified exact time (ISO 8601 format).

value_schema.description: Only return Blog Tags last updated at exactly the specified time.

parameters.name: updated_after
parameters.description: Return Blog Tags last updated after the specified date and time. Provide in ISO 8601 format, e.g., '2023-10-21T15:30:00Z'.

value_schema.description: Only return Blog Tags last updated after the specified time.

parameters.name: last_updated_before
parameters.description: Return blog tags updated before this date and time (in ISO 8601 format).

value_schema.description: Only return Blog Tags last updated before the specified time.

parameters.name: sort_fields_for_results
parameters.description: Fields to sort results by. Options: `name`, `createdAt`, `updatedAt`, `createdBy`, `updatedBy`. Default is `createdAt`.

value_schema.description: Specifies which fields to use for sorting results. Valid fields are `name`, `createdAt`, `updatedAt`, `createdBy`, `updatedBy`. `createdAt` will be used by default.

parameters.name: pagination_cursor_token
parameters.description: The token to retrieve the next set of results from a paginated response. Obtain this from the `paging.next.after` property in the previous response.

value_schema.description: The cursor token value to get the next set of results. You can get this from the `paging.next.after` JSON property of a paged response containing more results.

parameters.name: maximum_results_to_return
parameters.description: Specify the maximum number of blog tags to return. Default is 100.

value_schema.description: The maximum number of results to return. Default is 100.

parameters.name: additional_properties
parameters.description: Include additional fields in the response. Specify the properties you want to retrieve.

parameters.name: include_archived_tags
parameters.description: Specify whether to return deleted blog tags. Defaults to false.

value_schema.description: Specifies whether to return deleted Blog Tags. Defaults to `false`.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the hubspot_cms API.

parameters.name: createdAt
parameters.description: Only return Blog Tags created at exactly the specified time.

value_schema.description: Only return Blog Tags created at exactly the specified time.

parameters.name: createdAfter
parameters.description: Only return Blog Tags created after the specified time.

value_schema.description: Only return Blog Tags created after the specified time.

parameters.name: createdBefore
parameters.description: Only return Blog Tags created before the specified time.

value_schema.description: Only return Blog Tags created before the specified time.

parameters.name: updatedAt
parameters.description: Only return Blog Tags last updated at exactly the specified time.

value_schema.description: Only return Blog Tags last updated at exactly the specified time.

parameters.name: updatedAfter
parameters.description: Only return Blog Tags last updated after the specified time.

value_schema.description: Only return Blog Tags last updated after the specified time.

parameters.name: updatedBefore
parameters.description: Only return Blog Tags last updated before the specified time.

value_schema.description: Only return Blog Tags last updated before the specified time.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Specifies which fields to use for sorting results. Valid fields are `name`, `createdAt`, `updatedAt`, `createdBy`, `updatedBy`. `createdAt` will be used by default.

value_schema.description: Specifies which fields to use for sorting results. Valid fields are `name`, `createdAt`, `updatedAt`, `createdBy`, `updatedBy`. `createdAt` will be used by default.

parameters.name: after
parameters.description: The cursor token value to get the next set of results. You can get this from the `paging.next.after` JSON property of a paged response containing more results.

value_schema.description: The cursor token value to get the next set of results. You can get this from the `paging.next.after` JSON property of a paged response containing more results.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of results to return. Default is 100.

value_schema.description: The maximum number of results to return. Default is 100.

parameters.name: archived
parameters.description: Specifies whether to return deleted Blog Tags. Defaults to `false`.

value_schema.description: Specifies whether to return deleted Blog Tags. Defaults to `false`.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
